tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is patient, systematic and empathetic in his approach. He checks the previous records goes through and recommends relevant investigation to achieve proper diagnosis and the severity of disease extent. Happy with the treatment so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My father Ramdas nayak is a patient of liver cancer which was diagnosed in the month of early June 2017. I visited Dr Vasudev he immediately confirmed the diagnosis and explained about my father's terminal nature of the condition. He was sympathetic to us in explaining the gravity of the situation and made us understand that there could be very little which can be offered as treatment to my father in this terminal condition. Doctor admitted my father when he was extremely sick and got him better by just conservative treatment without any expensive care. He taught us the "end of the life care" which can be offered at home itself avoiding the unnecessary expenses of hospitalisation. My father today is happy though weak at present living amongst us at our own home. I am greatful to Dr Vasudev and his team of doctors for the support which they extended to us during the hard times we had been through. What I appreciate about Dr Vasudev is that he is straightforward and doesn't make the patient spend unnecessarily for expensive test and expensive treatment which the patient may not require in all the instances

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for pain in the anal canal with bleeding. Doctor performed colonoscopy which was painless. It revealed hemorrhoids and whole process was smooth. I am relieved off the problem now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: my son had already visited the doctor, hence was calling for an urgent issue and wanted a video conferencing. the first thing the clinic asked for was Rs. 2000 consultation fee. my 19 yr old son who is in hostel promptly paid the fees. pls note no one has asked the issue at this time. once fees paid, he was asked to be on standby between 6 - 7pm to wait for Doctor's call.  Seems like he went to the washroom and in that 5 min the doctor's office called 5 times and messaged him back "called you 5 times, no response". When he hurriedly called back, he was told the doctor left. 15 min later, the doctor's office called to tell my son, doctor has asked to return the fees. **** ************** ********* ** *** ****** ********** ******* **** * ***** **** I would not recommend anyone to have this kind of experience, especially when they are in need of doctor's advise. **** *********** ** *** ******* ******* ******* *** ********* ** ******** ***** *** **** *** ** **** **** ******** *************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ****** ** * ***** ** ******* *** ****** ** ** ******* * ****** **** *** *** * ******* Apparently, you are supposed to pay before consultation. Ever heard that at a clinic? ** ** ***** *** ************ *** ******* **** *** **** ******* ******* ****** ****** ****** ** ***** ******* **** ** ****** ******** They have a board saying paying before consultation is a must. They kept giving me repeated calls 1 hour before the appointment saying that visit fast or the doctor will leave ** ****** ***** ** *** ******** ***** *** **** ***** **** ******* ****** ****** **** ***** **** ***** **** **** *******
reply_text:
You have to follow the rules set for the clinic. Prepayment is must at many of the hospitals. For you it may be first experience. It was informed to you before you even visited. The board is displayed as per medical council guidelines. Yes doctor would leave if you don‚Äôt turn up on your appointment time. 
Anyways you have not even visited us to write an experience. I hope writing this review made you trigger happy.

tags: None
review: Those i had recent reports from kokilaben hospital and I had just visited for consultation Dr ask to go for further 15k test then only he was going suggests diat or treatment though I had not any health ssue only few parameters were distributed and I wanted consultant. Both test he suggested from his clinic. I was thinking on the base of his experience and report i had he will suggest some diat and medicine and if after few month improvement dose not see he may ask for further test. I immediately left the hospital and taken opinion at another Dr .

tags: None
review: Didn't feel welcome by the doc. Normally never review docs cause they work hard and help a lot of ppl and it can't be easy. But for a high fee of ‚Çπ2000, I got hardly 5-7mins with the doctor. No physical exam was done, felt rushed, no questions asked to me just gave me a prescription and asked me to come back after a month. * ***** **** *** ******** ** ** ****** ** **** ***** ******* ** ********* Also there is a feeling of a lack of empathy and I definitely felt judged when I asked a few questions that I thought were normal. Being sincere and empathetic while taking the time to understand the history and problem property is the bare minimum you would expect* ** **** **** ******* ** ********* **** *** *** **** **** ******** **** **** * ********* ****** *** ***** * ************* ******* ******* ****** *** ****** **** **** ****** Here I spent 20mins waiting and 5 mins with the doctor. Reasons behind medication were hardly explained and I felt no confidence in the overall treatment... Some patients might be ok with this but I wanted some further understanding of the issues. A little goes a long way so I hope this feedback is taken correctly...

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Vasudev should be polite and friendly with patients. In emergency, there‚Äôs no way to contact him and the only option is to visit his clinic. He is not available to talk on the phone/email/whatsapp, even if it is about reports. 
Prior appointment doesn‚Äôt help, there‚Äôs always long wait of more than an hour.
reply_text: We clearly inform the patients that there is no emergency service available on whatsapp. Please read the prescription, it mentions it. You signed on the registration form also which mentions the above details. No emergency should be treated on whatsapp or phone call dear. Rather you should visit emergency room of the hospital for an emergency. This is a clinic setting, not a hospitality sector to fine tune the consultation time and duration of each consult.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I came to Doctor after visting thrice to gastro specialist at various places, Delhi and Noida. I came here and was made to undego certain tests, which gave them clear picture of disease i was carrying or infection i had. Line of treatment was confimed and informed so as to soothe and lead a positive effect. I came with jaundice infection and all the LFT parameters were way beyond the limits. I was petrified but what calm and pleasant effect his treatment had on me can't be explained i  words. Thanks for all the treatment and advise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: First he will recommend test of colonscopy, either it would be needed or not doesn't matter. Cholonscopy test in an average is around 10K but here it charges 20K. Anorectal manometry charges 10K.  *** ****** ******* **** *********** ** ***** **** ******* ****** ** **** I would not recommend to this because ** **** ** *************** ******* ** * **** ** ******* ** *** *** ******* ** ****** **** **** he doesn't entertain when I came to consult after blood report and said I wouldn't entertain you untill you came back with MR(defecatory) report. That cost is approx 8.5K. finally I choose not to look back to this doctor. I have lost my 40K in just 2 days and all my efforts goes in vein.
reply_text: Your wife had issues of constipation which was intractable constipation which was not getting relieved with any medication. I suggested you colonoscopy and anorectal Manometry which came positive and a diagnosis was achieved which required treatment after MR defecography. You and your wife were discussed with about the results of the tests done and why MR defecography was required to solve the problem. It‚Äôs your problem if you didn‚Äôt want to do any particular investigation. But treatment is not possible without the same. Wrt charges, the charges are inclusive of everything which includes anaesthesia consumables and other logistics which are billed separately at other places. They are not colonoscopy charges alone. Don‚Äôt play a victim card by blaming the doctors and writing some crap. You will understand when you visit other places.. All the best..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I started having the symptoms of reflux associated with acidity, foreign body sensation in throat, bloating and similar symptoms like gastritis. 
Doctor Vasudev‚Äôs consultation and endoscopy could find out the exact cause of my problem which was HPylori infection.
I was too scared to go ahead with the endoscopy procedure but trust me it was therapeutic and was done with so much ease. 
The treatment given was best and my symptoms are 95 percent gone. I am relieved and my lifestyle is getting back to normal. 
I recommend Dr. Vasudev to each one of you if you are suffering and not getting any relief from you gastric issues.
Thanks Doc.
reply_text: Thank you Mrs Shagun for the detailed review of your experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was experiencing severe gastric issue, bloating from past one month. I waited around 15 days then searched in practo & found Dr. Vasudev. When I visited him he simply presented me 2 options. 
1. We can try some meds and see if it improves
2. Or do endoscopy & find the root cause & then treat.

I chose option 2. I would say it is the best center for painless endoscopy. After endoscopy I got to know I have stomach ulcers. He gave me prescription for 2 weeks & I am completely fit now.

Would recommend him if you want the right treatment & early recovery. He prescribes only after proper diagnosis which I think is the right approach.

I am highly thankful to Dr Vasudev.

reply_text: Your brother Sanjay Nagarkar visited us on 07/02/2024. He was suffering from Non cardiac chest pain, chest discomfort and bloating persistently. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have abdominal pain and my SGPT level was elevated. I have taken treatment at different renowned  hospitals and multiple medicines I had taken but no improvement seen in health.
Before 4 months I visited to dr.  Vasudev at Chembur Clinic . He is speaking very friendly and giving confidence of cure. Initially  he has done fibriscan and blood tests for better clarity and accordingly he has suggested diet plan to reduce 3-4 kg weight loss  with prescribing any medicines. I have reduced my weight  by 4 kg within 2 months I e.from 66 to 62.
Now I am feeling better and no abdominal pain as well as my SGPT level is also within limit.
Thanks to dr. Vasudev for advice and fast  recovery without medicine.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The patient showed heavy intestinal bleeding and and was admitted via the emergency room with a poor prognosis .Dr Vasudeva had her moved to ICU assessed and prepared for the required procedure (s) which were likely to resolve the issue .He counselled  us on anxiety elements and executed his task of the procedure endo /colonoscopy  with skill and competence under high risk conditions given the status of the patient .He managed to stop the bleeding and having identified the cause prescribed further medication to prevent reoccurance .For his handling of the case we are very satisfied with Dr Vasudeva and would recommend him to all patients seeking treatment for Gastro and other issues in his area of specialization .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went to get a family member checked out for extreme pain. The doctor and nurses were really kind and understanding and listened to the problem patiently. The doctor then recommended surgery. Before, during and after the surgery the nurses were really kind and caring and answered all the questions at all times. Dr. Vasudev also seems quite proficient at his job and he answered every question we asked. It is, however, on the higher side of the price spectrum but otherwise the procedure and after-care were impeccable. It‚Äôs been a month since the surgery and the pain has mostly subsided.

review:

I Am regular patient of dr. Vasudev. I was facing gastro intestinal issue since 2 years. I have consulted with lots of doctor but was not getting the root cause of the disease. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Madam/ Sir
I have consulted with Dr C Vasudev, Gastroenterologist, Regd No 2014/11/4669 Maharastra Medical Council on 20-09-2021 related to gas related issues along with previous medical prescriptions. 
Doctor has not even listen my problem *** *** ******* ***** He directly suggested for endoscopy. I was completely astonished and set aback. * **** **** ******** ********* *** **** ** ******* ******* ***** ** ***** ** ***** *** ***** ** *** ********* ************In the evening his receptionist call me for appointment of endoscopy for which I refused. Later on doctor has prescribed me medicines which are being already taken by me, over a SMS link to download from the app.

In light of above, I am very disappointed and decided to not visit the doctor again nor recommend him to anyone. 
Regards 
Priyanka Shrivastava
reply_text:
Dear Priyanka Srivastava 

You have visited our clinic for your gastric issues after your symptoms failed to respond to medications advised by your previous doctors. Your previous doctors had advised right medications but unfortunately they didn‚Äôt help you. 

In such cases it is medically wise to advise investigations to find out as to what exactly the reason why you are having persistent symptoms. The same was explained to you in detail before ordering investigation. We thought that you would be coming for investigations next day as scheduled and informed to you. 

Since you said that you are not inclined to undergo investigations to the receptionist on the phone and wants medical treatment, we sent you the prescription which we felt is the best without doing investigations. Seek second opinion about the opinion I gave from medically qualified person. I can only say ‚ÄúAll the best to you‚Äù for your mindset that doctors advise investigations to make money. God bless you with good health

review: My appointment was supposed to start at 11:30 a.m., but the doctor kept me waiting until 12:45 p.m. This is extremely unprofessional, and the receptionist misled me about the availability of the doctor. I paid for the consultation beforehand and I was made to wait for over an hour  .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor spoke for minimum time. Didn't try to explain why the problem could occur or what procedure they were performing. During the physical examination he was very rude. ***** ** ******** ******* ********* he left the room, and his helper & receptionist told me what was the next expected step It was as if they wanted me to immediately pay for the next test, without getting a proper explanation. I had visited the doctor after reading his reviews, but the experience was not good.
reply_text:
Well, since you have come to the details of your case, lemme explain the same thing which I did during the visit so that review readers appreciate whether what you wrote could be a right honest review or not.

1. We made patients waiting for endoscopy procedures to wait since we wanted to save your time, we accommodated you in between since it was a few minutes examination in your case. I still don‚Äôt know the diagnosis since examination couldn‚Äôt be completed because of your excruciating pain. I don‚Äôt know if you still wanted the examination to be done despite your excruciating pain. 
2. We asked you to come for sigmoidoscopy the following day to be done under sedation which would be painless so that we make a proper diagnosis and treat you. Mind you, sigmoidoscopy is a test which can‚Äôt be done on the same day since it requires a bowel prep. You were told to come next day after proper preparation of the bowel. We don‚Äôt take charges for the test on the day of prescribing. We charge only on the day the test is done. 

You said we were in hurry. It seems like you are in a 
hurry and you didn‚Äôt not want a proper diagnosis and wanted treatment assuming that it is piles and not something else. Just to tell you, I don‚Äôt treat the patients without making a proper diagnosis. May be you will find a better doc. All the best anyways

review: We have been consulting him for the past few yrs and have been satisfied with his treatment. Doc is friendly and answers all the questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor. He explained my problem to me well and treated me to my satisfaction. Consultation is expensive compared to my past spends at Specialist doctors. Definitely worth recommending for his expertise, ********* *** *******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Happy with the treatment results. Recommended tests and medicine only that were essential and in line with my treatment. Efficient *** ******** **********

review:
Dr Vasudev was straight to the point and gave us the clear plan of action which we have to follow.Also cleared couple of doubts which we had about the diesease.
For the reports also he asked us to mail him .
Easily approachable
